010package Ch13_ColorImages;
011
012import java.awt.image.IndexColorModel;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import ij.text.TextWindow;
018
019public class Show_Lookup_Table implements  PlugInFilter {
020
021        @Override
022        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
023                return DOES_8G + DOES_8C;
024        }
025        
026        @Override
027        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
028                ImageProcessor ip2 = ip.createProcessor(256, 256); //ip.convertToByteProcessor();
029                int k = 0;
030                for (int row = 0; row < 16; row++) {
031                        int v = row * 16;
032                        for (int col = 0; col < 16; col++) {
033                                int u = col * 16;
034                                // fill the patch with value k
035                                for (int j = 0; j < 16; j++) {
036                                        for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
037                                                ip2.set(u + i, v + j, k);
038                                        }
039                                }
040                                k = k + 1;
041                        }
042                        
043                }
044                new ImagePlus("ColorTable", ip2).show();
045                
046                listLut(ip);
047                
048        }
049        
050        /**
051         * @author Wayne Rasband
052         * @param ip The image.
053         */
054        void listLut(ImageProcessor ip) {
055                IndexColorModel icm = (IndexColorModel) ip.getColorModel();
056                int size = icm.getMapSize();
057                byte[] r = new byte[size];
058                byte[] g = new byte[size];
059                byte[] b = new byte[size];
060                icm.getReds(r);
061                icm.getGreens(g);
062                icm.getBlues(b);
063                StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
064                String headings = "Index\tRed\tGreen\tBlue";
065                for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
066                        sb.append(i + "\t" + (r[i] & 255) + "\t" + (g[i] & 255) + "\t" + (b[i] & 255) + "\n");
067                new TextWindow("LUT", headings, sb.toString(), 250, 400);
068        }
069
070}
